Posts.EditableText: I haven't been using quest in a while because I got this new game that is just the coolest, and I've been so caught up in it that I haven't had time for quest. The game is.......The Sims 2!!!! I recommend it for everyone. In fact, to tell you the truth, I haven't even been playing the actual game. It has an in game feature that you can make movies...meaning that you can record your sims. So you can create a storyline and set the scene and tone, and then download a code to make your sims react emotionally how you want them to, and then shoot it. You get to experiment with really cool camera angles, and use a lot of creativity. Even if you haven't played the sims 1, I think you will love it. Though you will probably appreciate all the additions to the game more if you have played the first one. Anyway, just thought I'd share my opinion of a great game. P.S. I will probably start again on quest soon.....I can't keep away from it
Posts.HTML:

So you can create a storyline and set the scene and tone, and then download a code to make your sims react emotionally how you want them to, and then shoot it. You get to experiment with really cool camera angles, and use a lot of creativity. Even if you haven't played the sims 1, I think you will love it. Though you will probably appreciate all the additions to the game more if you have played the first one. Anyway, just thought I'd share my opinion of a great game.

Posts.EditableText: Ebayfan: Have you ever heard of either of the following: Red vs Blue, or The Strangerhood?  They're both productions by Rooster Teeth.  Red vs Blue is a series of movies in Halo and Halo 2, while The Strangerhood is a series of movies in [i:282dm503]The Sims 2[/i:282dm503].  What you're doing has already been done, and is quite funny.  Go to [url:282dm503]http://www.roosterteeth.com[/url:282dm503] and follow the links.

Its just one of those things i can't stand.My sister plays it constantly,so theres times when i can't do sometimes vital stuff on the computer.My girlfriend also plays it so when she starts pplaying it,she doesn't get off it.
   I dont like it because its just like playing a huge game of life.Whats the point?!
